page.title: 01THURLASTON AREA
page.content: Thurlaston,in Warwickshire,is situated on the edge of Dunsmore Heath,350 feet above sea level.To the south are delightful views of Draycote Water.412 people live there.The village has changed,almost all the farmland was taken for the reservoir.The M45 passes through the area,making it a useful commuter base.Local schools are in Dunchurch and Rugby. It is a peaceful village apart from the hum of the motorway.The people seem friendly.Many are older.The Post Office is the only shop.A windmill is visible,as is the 19th century Church. The area around is mainly farmland and residential.It is better to have a car as public transport is limited.The nearest hamlets are Toft and Cawston.
